name: backwardSub

display_html:
class Num r => Algebra r m where
  • mult :: (m -> m -> r) -> m -> r
  • unital :: r -> m -> r
name: Algebra mult unital

display_html:
class Num r => Coalgebra r m where
  • comult :: (m -> r) -> m -> m -> r
  • counital :: (m -> r) -> r
name: Coalgebra comult counital

display_html: multRep :: (Representable f, Algebra r (Rep f)) => f (f r) -> f r
name: multRep

display_html: unitalRep :: (Representable f, Algebra r (Rep f)) => r -> f r
name: unitalRep

display_html: comultRep :: (Representable f, Coalgebra r (Rep f)) => f r -> f (f r)
name: comultRep

display_html: counitalRep :: (Representable f, Coalgebra r (Rep f)) => f r -> r
name: counitalRep

display_html:
newtype Covector r a = Covector {
  • runCovector :: (a -> r) -> r
}
name: Covector Covector runCovector

display_html: ($*) :: Representable f => Covector r (Rep f) -> f r -> r

class Additive (Diff p) => Affine p where
  • type Diff p :: * -> *
  • (.-.) :: Num a => p a -> p a -> Diff p a
  • (.+^) :: Num a => p a -> Diff p a -> p a
  • (.-^) :: Num a => p a -> Diff p a -> p a
name: Affine .-^ .+^ .-. Diff

display_html: qdA :: (Affine p, Foldable (Diff p), Num a) => p a -> p a -> a
name: qdA

display_html: distanceA :: (Floating a, Foldable (Diff p), Affine p) => p a -> p a -> a
name: distanceA

display_html: newtype Point f a = P (f a)
name: Point P

display_html: lensP :: Lens' (Point g a) (g a)
name: lensP

display_html: _Point :: Iso' (Point f a) (f a)
name: _Point

display_html: (.#) :: Coercible b a => (b -> c) -> (a -> b) -> a -> c
(#.) :: Coercible c b => (b -> c) -> (a -> b) -> a -> c
unP :: Point f a -> f a
name: unP

display_html: origin :: (Additive f, Num a) => Point f a
name: origin

display_html: relative :: (Additive f, Num a) => Point f a -> Iso' (Point f a) (f a)
name: relative
